trans-unit.source: Wraps the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> class, it to be placed as a subelement of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> class.

The KeyInfoEncryptedKey class wraps the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class, which allows you to add the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class as a subelement of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> class.
Initialize the KeyInfoEncryptedKey class to an instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class when you need to add an encrypted session key to your encrypted XML document.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"></xref> class.
This constructor does not initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey> class using an instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey.EncryptedKey%2A> property to specify an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> object when you use this constructor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> object that encapsulates an encrypted key.
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> object that encapsulates an encrypted key.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey> class wraps the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class, which allows you to add the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class as a subelement of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> class.
Use the EncryptedKey property to access the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class contained within the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey> class.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> object that encapsulates an encrypted key.
The EncryptedKey property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Returns an XML representation of a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"></xref> object.
An XML representation of a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"></xref> object.
The encrypted key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"></xref> object to match.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that specifies the state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoEncryptedKey"></xref> object.
